agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: This series documents dispute resolution proceedings leading to a voluntary settlement. This series may include, but is not limited to: complaint forms, response letters, correspondence, and other material used or produced during proceedings.

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: This series documents annual reports submitted by Property Owners Associations as required by the
legal_citation: Code of Virginia. This series is limited to, annual reports. COV 55-516.1

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: Certification, and Registration This series documents the eligibility of applicants for licensure, certification, or registration. This series may include but is not limited to: applications, references, education/experience verifications, transcripts of licensing IFFs, and licensing agreements. Title 54.1

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: Rejected This series documents applicants who are not eligibile for licensure, certification, or registration. This series may include, but is not limited to, deficient applications.

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: This series documented receipt of applications for licensure, certification or registration.

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: Licensure, Post Licensure and Continuing Education This series documents qualifications of course providers and the contents of courses. This series may include, but is not limited to, applications, instructor's resume, syllabuses, and course materials.

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: Determination Files This series documents the review of complaints submitted through an association's complaint procedures and the Common Interest Community Ombudsman's written determinations. This series may include but is not limited to: complaint forms and notices of final adverse decisions.

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: This series documents the registration of withdrawable, convertible, or expandable condominiums. This series may include, but is not limited to, property information and correspondence

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: Registration Files This series documents the registration of condominiums, cooperatives, and/or time shares. This series may include, but is not limited to, property information and correspondence

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: This series documents the completion of any continuing education required prior to license renewal. This series may include, but is not limited to, reporting forms and transcripts.

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: This series documents case decisions and sanctions imposed by regulatory boards under the
legal_citation: Code of Virginia. This series may include, but is not limited to: final reports, consent orders, conciliation agreements, cease and desist orders, and accompanying investigative reports. 54.1-100, et seq

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: This series documents candidacy for and results of examinations of professions. This series may include, but is not limited to, examination candidate rosters. Title 54.1

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: This series documents investigations into possible violations of board regulations and/or the provisions of the
legal_citation: Code of Virginia. This series may include, but is not limited to: complaints, claims, supporting documentation, response letters, correspondence, findings reports, exhibits, investigator field notes, and case files.

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_title: Recovery Fund Claim Files: Payment Records
series_description: This series documents payments to persons awarded judgments against contractors or real estate licensees. This series may include, but is not limited to, payments and correspondence. 54.1-1118; 54.1-2112

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: This series documents potential recovery fund claims files against contractors, real estate, or common interest community licensees. This series may include, but is not limited to, complaints, claims, and case files.

agency_name: Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation
series_description: This series documents the eligibility of applicants for temporary permits to practice or do business until the applicant is or is not issued the final license, certification, or registration. This series may include, but is not limited to, permits.
